ygData.subject: Re: purple and such
ygData.msgSnippet: And do it again every time you zone. Zoning flips you back to anon if you are purple. ... From:	Bob Stewart [mailto:bstewart@cisco.com] Sent:	Tuesday, June 29,
ygData.messageBody:
And do it again every time you zone. Zoning flips you back to anon if you
are purple.

-----Original Message-----
From: Bob Stewart [mailto:bstewart@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 11:48 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] purple and such

From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>

At 09:41 AM 6/29/99 -0700, jay schultze wrote:
>Personally I'd love to go purple, but my guild doesn't
allow it because it
>also makes you anonymous. People like me are your worst
nightmare!!! Purple
>but ya never knew! muahahahaha

Is your guild not aware that you can switch anonymous off?
I was not
pleased to find that invoking /roleplay also made me
anonymous. Verant
blindsided me with an unexpected side effect. So when
turning on /roleplay
I simply try to remember to go to Options-General and turn
anonymous back off.

Bob
